publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2625 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Iain Gray*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Peter Peacock*

S1M-2625 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Iain Gray, Malcolm Chisholm, Peter Peacock
